definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: stop up, shut up, keep close (NH id.; Targum [[סְתַם]] id.; Syr. st.am (stm very rare); Ar. sadama close door Lane:1334, and sat.ama Kam Frey, are perh. loan-words);—
stop up springs of water 2Ki 3:19, 2Ki 3:25, 2Ch 32:3, 2Ch 32:4, cf. v:2Ch 32:30.

shut up, keep close, prophetic words Da 8:26, Da 12:4, Da 12:9; [[בְּסָתֻם]] Ps 51:8 in (the) closed (chamber of the breast; ‖[[טֻחוֹת]]).—[[כָּל־סָתוּם]] Ez Eze 28:3 usu. no secret is too dark for thee, but doubtful (v. II. [[עמם]]); LXX sofoi/, Co [[חַרְטֻמִּים]] < Toy [[חֲכָמִים]], or Berthol. [[קׂסְמִים]].

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[לְהִסָּתֵם]] Ne 4:1 the breaches [in the walls] had begun to be stopped up.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. sf. [[סִתְּמוּם]] Ge 26:16; Impf. 3 mpl. sf. [[וַיְסַתְּמוּם]] v:Ge 26:18, both of stopping wells quite up (R:JE).
